title: Lazy Configuration
description: Use lazy delegation to defer expensive initialization until first access.
instructions: Create a class AppConfig with a lazy property databaseUrl that prints 'Loading config...' when first accessed, then returns the URL. Access it twice and show that initialization happens only once.

hints.text: Use 'by lazy { }' to declare the property
Put the print statement inside the lazy block
lazy only executes the block on first access

commonMistakes.consequence: Loading happens at object creation, not first use
commonMistakes.correction: Use by lazy for deferred initialization

commonMistakes.consequence: lateinit requires manual initialization, not computed
commonMistakes.correction: Use lazy when the value is computed from a block

commonMistakes.mistake: Expecting lazy block to run every time
commonMistakes.consequence: Block only runs once, result is cached
commonMistakes.correction: lazy computes once and caches the result
